channel.title: Comments for Blockonomi
channel.description: Cryptocurrency News & Your Guide to the Blockchain Economy

item.title: Comment on Blockfi Review: Bitcoin & Cryptocurrency Asset-Backed Loans by Hairstyles
item.dc:creator: Hairstyles
item.description: Thanks for your write-up. One other thing is that individual American states have their own personal laws that affect homeowners, which makes it very difficult for the the nation's lawmakers to come up with the latest set of recommendations concerning property foreclosures on property owners. The problem is that each state has got own laws and regulations which may have interaction in an unfavorable manner with regards to foreclosure insurance policies.
item.content:encoded: Thanks for your write-up. One other thing is that individual American states have their own personal laws that affect homeowners, which makes it very difficult for the the nation’s lawmakers to come up with the latest set of recommendations concerning property foreclosures on property owners. The problem is that each state has got own laws and regulations which may have interaction in an unfavorable manner with regards to foreclosure insurance policies.

item.title: Comment on Cardano Integration With Dapps Continues as Alonzo Gets Closer by mr4nders0n
item.dc:creator: mr4nders0n
item.description: Does anyone know what advantages (and disadvantages) the sundaeswap dex has compared to uniswap, pancakeswap and sushiswap and are there any other serious contenders likely to take the cardano dex space ?
item.content:encoded: Does anyone know what advantages (and disadvantages) the sundaeswap dex has compared to uniswap, pancakeswap and sushiswap and are there any other serious contenders likely to take the cardano dex space ?

item.title: Comment on Beginnerâ€™s Guide to CEX.IO: Complete Review by CEX.IO
item.dc:creator: CEX.IO
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://blockonomi.com/cex-review/#comment-155141">Nikola</a>.
Dear Nikola,
We appreciate your time to share your opinion about CEX.IO.
The whole Team works as one to provide users with a fast and secure trading on our platform. Your feedback just proves that our efforts are not vain but valued and that we were able to hit the mark for you.
Let us please mention that the commission is not only the cost of withdrawal, it is also the support and cost of the infrastructure. Still, we regularly review fees based on the number of transactions, coin rate and maintenance costs.
Keep enjoying our services and products and feel welcome to contact us whenever you have any other feedback, comments, or suggestions.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Nikola.

Dear Nikola,

We appreciate your time to share your opinion about CEX.IO.

The whole Team works as one to provide users with a fast and secure trading on our platform. Your feedback just proves that our efforts are not vain but valued and that we were able to hit the mark for you.

Let us please mention that the commission is not only the cost of withdrawal, it is also the support and cost of the infrastructure. Still, we regularly review fees based on the number of transactions, coin rate and maintenance costs.

Keep enjoying our services and products and feel welcome to contact us whenever you have any other feedback, comments, or suggestions.

item.title: Comment on Beginnerâ€™s Guide to CEX.IO: Complete Review by CEX.IO
item.dc:creator: CEX.IO
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://blockonomi.com/cex-review/#comment-155140">Lkhagvasuren .N</a>.
Dear Lkhagvasuren .N,
Thanks for taking the time to post your review.
It is the biggest pleasure for us to hear your evaluation and that you are satisfied with our services. Each one at CEX.IO works on fulfilling the users' trading needs and requests.
If you have any more comments, queries, or suggestions - feel free to reach us at any time.
We are always looking forward to receiving community input.

item.title: Comment on Beginnerâ€™s Guide to CEX.IO: Complete Review by Nikola
item.dc:creator: Nikola
item.description: Cex is pretty good exchange app, fees are low, transtactions are fast, the only bad thing is that there are high fees on withdrawing certain coins.
item.content:encoded: Cex is pretty good exchange app, fees are low, transtactions are fast, the only bad thing is that there are high fees on withdrawing certain coins.

item.title: Comment on Beginnerâ€™s Guide to CEX.IO: Complete Review by Lkhagvasuren .N
item.dc:creator: Lkhagvasuren .N
item.description: Cex.io is very good Cryptocurrency exchange site with lots of cryptocurrency variety, easy to use interface both for beginners and experienced users. What i like it here is it's high security.
item.content:encoded: Cex.io is very good Cryptocurrency exchange site with lots of cryptocurrency variety, easy to use interface both for beginners and experienced users. What i like it here is it’s high security.
